name: Big Wins Pay Wheel
description:
Come play Big Wins Pay Wheel- the best Vegas casino slot machines. Start with a huge bonus to start your slots adventure.

Feel the thrill of being in Vegas in the palm of your hands with our Loose reels & Frequent Bonuses.

WIN THE BIGGEST JACKPOTS AND ENJOY THE BIGGEST BONUSES TODAY

Get a Huge starting bonus when you play today! Our thrilling slot machines have all of the Las Vegas casino features like Wild Multipliers, Free Spins and Tons of Bonuses!

This Slot Machine also contains one of the most exciting sticky wild machines you will ever PLAY!

- Coin bonuses hourly as well as daily bonuses

-High Definition Graphics

-Daily tournaments with Big Prizes

-Plenty of high-quality slot games with BIG JACKPOTS

-Offline & Online gameplay

This game is intended for an adult audience and does not offer real money gambling or an opportunity to win real money or prizes. Practice or success at social gaming does not imply future success at real money gambling.
